saying: There's no excuse for half-baked potatoes.
description: Tybalt is a jock, tiger villager from the Animal Crossing series, who appears from Doubutsu no Mori until Doubutsu no Mori e+, after which he would not appear again until Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo, being mostly replaced by Rowan, another tiger who was given the jock personality in Animal Crossing: Wild World. The name Tybalt is most likely taken from William Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet, being named after the character of the same name. This is especially considering that another character in the play makes a scene of nicknaming Tybalt the "King of Cats," which in itself is a reference to Tybalt/Tibert the Cat from the story of Reynard the Fox. His Japanese name is the alias of the Japanese bandit Tani Yukata who was active in Malaya, Harimau, which is Malay for "tiger."
